long_description: The Pediped Saturn shoes are perfect for boys on the move. These shoes are a great choice for rising athletes taking the field, and kids who simply enjoy being active on the playground. Breathable mesh uppers feature PVC and polyurethane overlays for support; rip-and-stick instep strap secures the fit, and is easy for them to put on and take off. Flex Fit System provides additional insoles that can be inserted for a snug fit, then removed as his foot grows; insoles reduce shoe size by a half size. Synthetic mesh liings are highly breathable for all-day comfort. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion. Rubber outsoles feature flex grooves to ensure natural motion. Machine washable for easy care.
short_description: The Pediped Saturn shoes are perfect for boys on the move. These shoes are a great choice for rising athletes taking the field, and kids who simply enjoy being active on the playground.
